job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a Backend Engineer with some knowledge of DevOps (or a willingness to learn) to join our talented team. You will play a crucial role in building and maintaining our backend infrastructure while contributing to product development, including launching new features and services from scratch.

   What You'll Do:
     * Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products. Bring your ideas and those of your team to life by designing and implementing backend services that drive our platform forward.
     * Architect & optimize: Help scale our architecture, including cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow across multiple regions and workloads.
     * DevOps integration: Be hands-on with our DevOps setup, streamlining deployments, monitoring systems, and optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency using cloud-based tools and CI/CD workflows.
     * Collaborate on technical roadmaps: Participate in designing the technical roadmap, working closely with the CTO and other engineers to shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem.
     * Security and monitoring: Ensure our systems are secure and robust by integrating monitoring and security tools, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and implementing best practices for system reliability.

   Tech Stack You'll Be Working With:
     * Cloud platforms and deployment tools
     * FastAPI, React
     * Database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis)
     * LLM providers
     * Monitoring and CI/CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
     * REST APIs, Webhooks
job_details.full_text:
Backend Engineer

We are seeking a Backend Engineer with some knowledge of DevOps (or a willingness to learn) to join our talented team. You will play a crucial role in building and maintaining our backend infrastructure while contributing to product development, including launching new features and services from scratch.

   What You'll Do:
     * Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products. Bring your ideas and those of your team to life by designing and implementing backend services that drive our platform forward.
     * Architect & optimize: Help scale our architecture, including cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow across multiple regions and workloads.
     * DevOps integration: Be hands-on with our DevOps setup, streamlining deployments, monitoring systems, and optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency using cloud-based tools and CI/CD workflows.
     * Collaborate on technical roadmaps: Participate in designing the technical roadmap, working closely with the CTO and other engineers to shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem.
     * Security and monitoring: Ensure our systems are secure and robust by integrating monitoring and security tools, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and implementing best practices for system reliability.

   Tech Stack You'll Be Working With:
     * Cloud platforms and deployment tools
     * FastAPI, React
     * Database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis)
     * LLM providers
     * Monitoring and CI/CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
     * REST APIs, Webhooks

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend engineering and DevOps practices. While it mentions 'LLM providers' and 'cloud platforms', it lacks specific details about generative AI tasks like fine-tuning, RAG, or prompt engineering, which are core to a GenAI Engineer role.

phrases: building and maintaining our backend infrastructure
contributing to product development, including launching new features and services from scratch
Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products.
designing and implementing backend services that drive our platform forward.

Architect & optimize: Help scale our architecture, including cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow across multiple regions and workloads.
Collaborate on technical roadmaps: Participate in designing the technical roadmap, working closely with the CTO and other engineers to shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the design, implementation, and maintenance of backend services, APIs, and overall platform architecture, which are core to software development.

phrases: some knowledge of DevOps (or a willingness to learn)

DevOps integration: Be hands-on with our DevOps setup, streamlining deployments, monitoring systems, and optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency using cloud-based tools and CI/CD workflows.
Security and monitoring: Ensure our systems are secure and robust by integrating monitoring and security tools, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and implementing best practices for system reliability.
Monitoring and CI/CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions DevOps, CI/CD, deployments, monitoring, and infrastructure optimization, which are all key components of Operations Engineering.

phrases: launching new features and services from scratch
shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate involvement in product strategy and the translation of business needs into technical solutions.
